summary: An ordinance providing for the widening of Roosevelt Way, from East 85th Street to the north city limits and of 5th Avenue Northeast, from East 85th Street to East 94th Street, providing for the condemnation, appropriation, taking and damaging of land and other property necessary therefor, and for the making of the necessary slopes for cuts and fills upon the property abutting on said streets and providing the manner of payment therefor.
